controls.name: Exception Approval Chain Enforcement
controls.description: Ensures all exceptions follow the defined approval chain based on severity and financial impact
controls.test_procedure: Verify that no exception can be executed without all required approvals in the chain

controls.name: Segregation of Duties - Self-Approval Prevention
controls.description: Prevents any individual from approving their own exception, dispute, or change request
controls.test_procedure: Verify system blocks approval when requester_id matches approver_id

controls.name: Dispute 30-Day Submission Window
controls.description: Enforces 30-day window for dispute submission from transaction date
controls.test_procedure: Verify disputes outside window are rejected or require exception approval
controls.failure_action: Reject dispute or route to exception process
controls.risk_mitigated: Stale disputes, administrative burden, audit findings

controls.name: Evidence Chain of Custody
controls.description: Maintains complete chain of custody for all evidence attached to cases and decisions
controls.test_procedure: Verify all evidence items have timestamps, source systems, and record IDs
controls.risk_mitigated: Evidence tampering, audit failures, litigation exposure

controls.name: Version Control Immutability
controls.description: Ensures plan and policy versions are immutable once published
controls.test_procedure: Verify published versions cannot be modified; only superseded by new versions
controls.failure_action: Block modification attempt with audit log
controls.risk_mitigated: Plan tampering, audit trail gaps, compliance violations

controls.name: Change Impact Assessment Completion
controls.description: Requires complete impact assessment before routing changes for approval
controls.test_procedure: Verify changes cannot proceed to approval without financial model and population analysis
controls.failure_action: Block approval routing until assessment complete
controls.risk_mitigated: Uninformed decisions, financial surprises, compliance gaps

controls.name: Pay Cycle Dual Approval
controls.description: Requires both Finance and SalesOps approval before pay cycle release
controls.test_procedure: Verify payroll file cannot be released without both approvals
controls.failure_action: Block release until both approvals obtained

controls.name: Reconciliation Completion Gate
controls.description: Prevents pay cycle approval until all reconciliation discrepancies are resolved
controls.test_procedure: Verify open discrepancies block progression to approval state
controls.risk_mitigated: Payment errors, data integrity issues, audit findings

controls.name: Decision Authority Citation Requirement
controls.description: Requires all rulings and decisions to cite policy authority and evidence basis
controls.test_procedure: Verify decisions cannot be published without authority_basis and evidence_basis populated
controls.failure_action: Block decision publication until citations complete
controls.risk_mitigated: Arbitrary decisions, inconsistent rulings, appeal exposure

controls.name: Audit Package Retention
controls.description: Ensures audit packages are created and retained according to retention policy
controls.test_procedure: Verify audit packages exist for all closed pay cycles and are retained per schedule
controls.failure_action: Alert compliance team; flag for remediation
controls.risk_mitigated: Regulatory non-compliance, litigation exposure, audit findings
